<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a25f1d7ccf87af8d87fcb950f7ed758b5"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a25f1d7ccf87af8d87fcb950f7ed758b5">isAligned</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Lhs, uint64&#95;t SizeInBytes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Checks that Addr is a multiple of the alignment.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af9992f46ab43b45770fddfdefef7c237"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af9992f46ab43b45770fddfdefef7c237">isAddrAligned</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Lhs, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Addr) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a25f1d7ccf87af8d87fcb950f7ed758b5">isAligned</a>(Lhs, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uintptr&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Addr));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns a multiple of A needed to store &#96;Size&#96; bytes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.value();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The following line is equivalent to &#96;(Size + Value - 1) / Value &#42; Value&#96;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The division followed by a multiplication can be thought of as a right</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// shift followed by a left shift which zeros out the extra bits produced in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the bump; &#96;~(Value - 1)&#96; is a mask where all those bits being zeroed out</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are just zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Most compilers can generate this code but the pattern may be missed when</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// multiple functions gets inlined.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> - 1) &amp; ~(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> - 1U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If non-zero \\p Skew is specified, the return value will be a minimal integer</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that is greater than or equal to \\p Size and equal to \\p A &#42; N + \\p Skew for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">/// some integer N. If \\p Skew is larger than \\p A, its value is adjusted to &#39;\\p</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Skew mod \\p A&#39;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Examples:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="comment">///   alignTo(5, Align(8), 7) = 7</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="comment">///   alignTo(17, Align(8), 1) = 17</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="comment">///   alignTo(~0LL, Align(8), 3) = 3</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\endcode</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a737a02bb132f38e96933e8061927b59f"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>, uint64&#95;t Skew) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.value();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">  Skew %= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
